verses.text: \w Then|strong="H6965"\w* \w God|strong="H1008"\w* said \w to|strong="H5927"\w* \w Jacob|strong="H3290"\w*, “\w Arise|strong="H6965"\w*, \w go|strong="H5927"\w* \w up|strong="H5927"\w* \w to|strong="H5927"\w* \w Bethel|strong="H1008"\w*, \w and|strong="H6965"\w* \w settle|strong="H3427"\w* \w there|strong="H8033"\w*. \w Build|strong="H6965"\w* \w an|strong="H6213"\w* \w altar|strong="H4196"\w* \w there|strong="H8033"\w* \w to|strong="H5927"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w God|strong="H1008"\w* \w who|strong="H3427"\w* \w appeared|strong="H7200"\w* \w to|strong="H5927"\w* \w you|strong="H6440"\w* \w when|strong="H7200"\w* \w you|strong="H6440"\w* \w fled|strong="H1272"\w* \w from|strong="H6440"\w* \w your|strong="H6440"\w* brother \w Esau|strong="H6215"\w*.”

\w So|strong="H5493"\w* \w Jacob|strong="H3290"\w* told \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w household|strong="H1004"\w* \w and|strong="H1004"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w who|strong="H3605"\w* \w were|strong="H3290"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w him|strong="H5973"\w*, “\w Get|strong="H8432"\w* rid \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w foreign|strong="H5236"\w* gods \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w are|strong="H1004"\w* \w among|strong="H8432"\w* \w you|strong="H3605"\w*. \w Purify|strong="H2891"\w* \w yourselves|strong="H8432"\w* \w and|strong="H1004"\w* \w change|strong="H2498"\w* \w your|strong="H3605"\w* \w garments|strong="H8071"\w*.

\w Then|strong="H6030"\w* \w let|strong="H1980"\w* \w us|strong="H6213"\w* \w arise|strong="H6965"\w* \w and|strong="H1980"\w* \w go|strong="H1980"\w* \w to|strong="H1980"\w* \w Bethel|strong="H1008"\w*. \w I|strong="H3117"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w build|strong="H6965"\w* \w an|strong="H6213"\w* \w altar|strong="H4196"\w* \w there|strong="H8033"\w* \w to|strong="H1980"\w* \w God|strong="H1008"\w*, \w who|strong="H6213"\w* \w answered|strong="H6030"\w* \w me|strong="H5978"\w* \w in|strong="H1980"\w* \w my|strong="H6965"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w distress|strong="H6869"\w*. \w He|strong="H3117"\w* \w has|strong="H1961"\w* \w been|strong="H1961"\w* \w with|strong="H1980"\w* \w me|strong="H5978"\w* \w wherever|strong="H8033"\w* \w I|strong="H3117"\w* \w have|strong="H1961"\w* \w gone|strong="H1980"\w*.”

\w So|strong="H5414"\w* \w they|strong="H3605"\w* \w gave|strong="H5414"\w* \w Jacob|strong="H3290"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w their|strong="H3605"\w* \w foreign|strong="H5236"\w* gods \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w their|strong="H3605"\w* \w earrings|strong="H5141"\w*, \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w Jacob|strong="H3290"\w* \w buried|strong="H2934"\w* \w them|strong="H5414"\w* \w under|strong="H8478"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* oak \f + \fr 35:4 \ft Or terebinth or great tree\f* \w near|strong="H5973"\w* \w Shechem|strong="H7927"\w*.

\w As|strong="H1961"\w* \w they|strong="H3808"\w* \w set|strong="H5265"\w* \w out|strong="H5265"\w*, \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w terror|strong="H2847"\w* \w from|strong="H5265"\w* \w God|strong="H3808"\w* \w fell|strong="H1961"\w* \w over|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w surrounding|strong="H5439"\w* \w cities|strong="H5892"\w*, \w so|strong="H1961"\w* \w that|strong="H5892"\w* \w they|strong="H3808"\w* \w did|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w pursue|strong="H7291"\w* \w Jacob|strong="H3290"\w*’s \w sons|strong="H1121"\w*.

\w So|strong="H1931"\w* \w Jacob|strong="H3290"\w* \w and|strong="H5971"\w* \w everyone|strong="H3605"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w him|strong="H5973"\w* arrived \w in|strong="H5971"\w* \w Luz|strong="H3870"\w* (\w that|strong="H5971"\w* \w is|strong="H1931"\w*, \w Bethel|strong="H1008"\w*) \w in|strong="H5971"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* land \w of|strong="H5971"\w* \w Canaan|strong="H3667"\w*.

\w There|strong="H8033"\w* \w Jacob|strong="H8033"\w* \w built|strong="H1129"\w* \w an|strong="H1129"\w* \w altar|strong="H4196"\w*, \w and|strong="H6440"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w called|strong="H7121"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w place|strong="H4725"\w* El-bethel,\f + \fr 35:7 \ft El-bethel means God of Bethel.\f* \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w it|strong="H7121"\w* \w was|strong="H4725"\w* \w there|strong="H8033"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w God|strong="H1008"\w* \w had|strong="H3588"\w* \w revealed|strong="H1540"\w* \w Himself|strong="H1540"\w* \w to|strong="H6440"\w* \w Jacob|strong="H8033"\w* \w as|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w fled|strong="H1272"\w* \w from|strong="H6440"\w* \w his|strong="H7121"\w* brother.

\w Now|strong="H7121"\w* \w Deborah|strong="H1683"\w*, \w Rebekah|strong="H7259"\w*’s \w nurse|strong="H3243"\w*, \w died|strong="H4191"\w* \w and|strong="H1008"\w* \w was|strong="H8034"\w* \w buried|strong="H6912"\w* \w under|strong="H8478"\w* \w the|strong="H7121"\w* oak \f + \fr 35:8 \ft Or great tree\f* \w below|strong="H8478"\w* \w Bethel|strong="H1008"\w*. \w So|strong="H7121"\w* Jacob \w named|strong="H7121"\w* \w it|strong="H7121"\w* Allon-bachuth.\f + \fr 35:8 \ft Allon-bacuth means oak of weeping.\f*

\w After|strong="H7200"\w* \w Jacob|strong="H3290"\w* \w had|strong="H3290"\w* returned \w from|strong="H7200"\w* \w Paddan-aram|strong="H6307"\w*,\f + \fr 35:9 \ft That is, northwest Mesopotamia; also in verse 26\f* God \w appeared|strong="H7200"\w* \w to|strong="H7200"\w* \w him|strong="H7200"\w* \w again|strong="H5750"\w* \w and|strong="H7200"\w* \w blessed|strong="H1288"\w* \w him|strong="H7200"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3478"\w* \w God|strong="H3808"\w* \w said|strong="H7121"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w him|strong="H7121"\w*, “\w Though|strong="H3588"\w* \w your|strong="H3588"\w* \w name|strong="H8034"\w* \w is|strong="H8034"\w* \w Jacob|strong="H3290"\w*,\f + \fr 35:10 \ft Jacob means he grasps the heel or he deceives.\f* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w longer|strong="H5750"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w called|strong="H7121"\w* \w Jacob|strong="H3290"\w*. \w Instead|strong="H3588"\w*, \w your|strong="H3588"\w* \w name|strong="H8034"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.\f + \fr 35:10 \ft Israel means he struggles with God.\f*” \w So|strong="H1961"\w* \w God|strong="H3808"\w* \w named|strong="H7121"\w* \w him|strong="H7121"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.

\w And|strong="H4428"\w* God told \w him|strong="H3318"\w*, “\w I|strong="H4480"\w* \w am|strong="H1961"\w* God \w Almighty|strong="H7706"\w*.\f + \fr 35:11 \ft Hebrew El-Shaddai\f* \w Be|strong="H1961"\w* \w fruitful|strong="H6509"\w* \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w multiply|strong="H7235"\w*. \w A|strong="H3068"\w* \w nation|strong="H1471"\w*—even \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w company|strong="H6951"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w nations|strong="H1471"\w*—\w shall|strong="H1471"\w* \w come|strong="H1961"\w* \w from|strong="H4480"\w* \w you|strong="H4480"\w*, \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w kings|strong="H4428"\w* \w shall|strong="H1471"\w* descend \w from|strong="H4480"\w* \w you|strong="H4480"\w*.

\w The|strong="H5414"\w* land \w that|strong="H5414"\w* \w I|strong="H5414"\w* \w gave|strong="H5414"\w* \w to|strong="H5414"\w* Abraham \w and|strong="H3327"\w* \w Isaac|strong="H3327"\w* \w I|strong="H5414"\w* \w will|strong="H5414"\w* \w give|strong="H5414"\w* \w to|strong="H5414"\w* \w you|strong="H5414"\w*, \w and|strong="H3327"\w* \w I|strong="H5414"\w* \w will|strong="H5414"\w* \w give|strong="H5414"\w* \w this|strong="H5414"\w* land \w to|strong="H5414"\w* \w your|strong="H5414"\w* \w descendants|strong="H2233"\w* \w after|strong="H2233"\w* \w you|strong="H5414"\w*.”

\w Then|strong="H1696"\w* God \w went|strong="H5927"\w* \w up|strong="H5927"\w* \w from|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w place|strong="H4725"\w* \w where|strong="H4725"\w* \w He|strong="H5921"\w* had \w spoken|strong="H1696"\w* \w with|strong="H1696"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w*.

\w So|strong="H1696"\w* \w Jacob|strong="H3290"\w* \w set|strong="H5324"\w* \w up|strong="H5324"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w pillar|strong="H4676"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w place|strong="H4725"\w* \w where|strong="H4725"\w* God \w had|strong="H3290"\w* \w spoken|strong="H1696"\w* \w with|strong="H1696"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w*—\w a|strong="H3068"\w* stone marker—\w and|strong="H8081"\w* \w he|strong="H5921"\w* \w poured|strong="H3332"\w* \w out|strong="H5258"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w drink|strong="H5262"\w* \w offering|strong="H5262"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w it|strong="H5921"\w* \w and|strong="H8081"\w* anointed \w it|strong="H5921"\w* \w with|strong="H1696"\w* \w oil|strong="H8081"\w*.

\w Jacob|strong="H3290"\w* \w called|strong="H7121"\w* \w the|strong="H7121"\w* \w place|strong="H4725"\w* \w where|strong="H8033"\w* \w God|strong="H1008"\w* \w had|strong="H3290"\w* \w spoken|strong="H1696"\w* \w with|strong="H1696"\w* \w him|strong="H7121"\w* \w Bethel|strong="H1008"\w*.\f + \fr 35:15 \ft Bethel means house of God.\f* Benjamin Born, Rachel Dies

\w Later|strong="H1961"\w*, \w they|strong="H3205"\w* \w set|strong="H5265"\w* \w out|strong="H5265"\w* \w from|strong="H5265"\w* \w Bethel|strong="H1008"\w*, \w and|strong="H1008"\w* \w while|strong="H5750"\w* \w they|strong="H3205"\w* \w were|strong="H1961"\w* \w still|strong="H5750"\w* \w some|strong="H3530"\w* \w distance|strong="H3530"\w* \w from|strong="H5265"\w* Ephrath, \w Rachel|strong="H7354"\w* \w began|strong="H1961"\w* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w give|strong="H3205"\w* \w birth|strong="H3205"\w*, \w and|strong="H1008"\w* \w her|strong="H3205"\w* \w labor|strong="H3205"\w* \w was|strong="H1961"\w* \w difficult|strong="H7185"\w*.

\w During|strong="H1961"\w* \w her|strong="H3205"\w* \w severe|strong="H7185"\w* \w labor|strong="H3205"\w*, \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w midwife|strong="H3205"\w* said \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w her|strong="H3205"\w*, “\w Do|strong="H2088"\w* \w not|strong="H2088"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w afraid|strong="H3372"\w*, \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w are|strong="H1121"\w* \w having|strong="H1961"\w* \w another|strong="H2088"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w*.”

\w And|strong="H3318"\w* \w with|strong="H3318"\w* \w her|strong="H7121"\w* \w last|strong="H3588"\w* \w breath|strong="H5315"\w*—\w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w she|strong="H3588"\w* \w was|strong="H8034"\w* \w dying|strong="H4191"\w*—\w she|strong="H3588"\w* \w named|strong="H7121"\w* \w him|strong="H7121"\w* \w Ben-oni|strong="H1126"\w*.\f + \fr 35:18 \ft Ben-oni could mean son of my sorrow or son of my strength.\f* \w But|strong="H3588"\w* \w his|strong="H7121"\w* father \w called|strong="H7121"\w* \w him|strong="H7121"\w* \w Benjamin|strong="H1144"\w*.\f + \fr 35:18 \ft Benjamin means son of my right hand.\f*

\w So|strong="H4191"\w* \w Rachel|strong="H7354"\w* \w died|strong="H4191"\w* \w and|strong="H1870"\w* \w was|strong="H1931"\w* \w buried|strong="H6912"\w* \w on|strong="H1870"\w* \w the|strong="H1870"\w* \w way|strong="H1870"\w* \w to|strong="H4191"\w* Ephrath (\w that|strong="H1931"\w* \w is|strong="H1931"\w*, \w Bethlehem|strong="H1035"\w*).

\w Jacob|strong="H3290"\w* \w set|strong="H5324"\w* \w up|strong="H5324"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w pillar|strong="H4676"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w her|strong="H5921"\w* \w grave|strong="H6900"\w*; \w it|strong="H1931"\w* marks \w Rachel|strong="H7354"\w*’s \w tomb|strong="H6900"\w* \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w this|strong="H1931"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w*. The Sons of Jacob (1 Chronicles 2:1–2)

\w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w again|strong="H3478"\w* \w set|strong="H5265"\w* \w out|strong="H5186"\w* \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w pitched|strong="H5186"\w* \w his|strong="H5186"\w* tent \w beyond|strong="H1973"\w* \w the|strong="H5186"\w* \w Tower|strong="H4029"\w* \w of|strong="H3478"\w* \w Eder|strong="H4029"\w*.

\w While|strong="H1961"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w was|strong="H1961"\w* \w living|strong="H7931"\w* \w in|strong="H3478"\w* \w that|strong="H8085"\w* region, \w Reuben|strong="H7205"\w* \w went|strong="H3212"\w* \w in|strong="H3478"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w slept|strong="H7901"\w* \w with|strong="H7901"\w* \w his|strong="H8085"\w* \w father|strong="H1121"\w*’s \w concubine|strong="H6370"\w* \w Bilhah|strong="H1090"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* \w about|strong="H1961"\w* \w it|strong="H1931"\w*. \w Jacob|strong="H3290"\w* \w had|strong="H1961"\w* \w twelve|strong="H8147"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w*:
The sons of Leah were Reuben the firstborn of Jacob, Simeon, Levi, Judah, Issachar, and Zebulun.
The sons of Rachel were Joseph and Benjamin.
The sons of Rachel’s maidservant Bilhah were Dan and Naphtali.

And the sons of Leah’s maidservant Zilpah were Gad and Asher. These \w are|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3205"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Jacob|strong="H3290"\w*, \w who|strong="H1121"\w* \w were|strong="H1121"\w* \w born|strong="H3205"\w* \w to|strong="H3205"\w* \w him|strong="H3205"\w* \w in|strong="H1121"\w* \w Paddan-aram|strong="H6307"\w*. The Death of Isaac

\w Jacob|strong="H3290"\w* returned \w to|strong="H8033"\w* \w his|strong="H3327"\w* father \w Isaac|strong="H3327"\w* \w at|strong="H8033"\w* \w Mamre|strong="H4471"\w*, \w near|strong="H8033"\w* \w Kiriath-arba|strong="H7153"\w* (\w that|strong="H1931"\w* \w is|strong="H1931"\w*, \w Hebron|strong="H2275"\w*), \w where|strong="H8033"\w* Abraham \w and|strong="H8033"\w* \w Isaac|strong="H3327"\w* \w had|strong="H3290"\w* \w stayed|strong="H1481"\w*.
\w And|strong="H3967"\w* \w Isaac|strong="H3327"\w* \w lived|strong="H1961"\w* 180 \w years|strong="H8141"\w*.

\w Then|strong="H3117"\w* \w he|strong="H3117"\w* \w breathed|strong="H1478"\w* \w his|strong="H3327"\w* \w last|strong="H1478"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w died|strong="H4191"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w was|strong="H3117"\w* gathered \w to|strong="H4191"\w* \w his|strong="H3327"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, \w old|strong="H1121"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w full|strong="H3117"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w years|strong="H3117"\w*. \w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w his|strong="H3327"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \w Esau|strong="H6215"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w Jacob|strong="H3290"\w* \w buried|strong="H6912"\w* \w him|strong="H4191"\w*.
